segments.text: Excuse me . I ’ m a stranger here and lost my way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Can I get to the central department stall this way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: uh ... Yes . Turn right , then take the second turning on your left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s about fifteen minutes ’ walk . That ’ s all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And do you know where the national bank is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It ’ s on this street . Keep walking for two blocks and it ’ s on the corner on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I won ’ t miss it .
segments.speaker: S1
